trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_SKYWATCHER_000_000<tab>Not that it isn't always wise to keep an eye on the skies, but in the Diadem it could be the difference between life and death, considering how it affects the behavior of beasts. Care to know what the fates have in store for us?

TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_030<tab>Some of Eureka's—rather vicious, I must say—fauna are active only in certain climatic conditions, so I do hope the adventuring contingent will take a healthy interest in my reports.

TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_100_030<tab>However, if you are hoping to glean some knowledge on the phenomenon of umbral turbulence, I am afraid you will be left wanting. It is a rather fickle atmospheric condition whose mysteries yet elude us.

TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_040<tab>At the moment, this region of the isle is experiencing intriguingly <var 28 ((Weather)) E80303 /var> atmospheric conditions<var 08 E4E803E804 ((<var 08 E4E804E805 ((, which will likely carry on for some time)) ((, which I expect will continue for a bit, to be followed by fascinating <var 40 ((<var 08 E4E80502 ((clear skies)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((dust storms)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((hot spells)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((heat waves)) ((<var 08 E4E80517 ((storm clouds)) ((<var 08 E4E80518 ((rough seas)) ((<var 08 E4E80519 ((rough seas)) ((<var 08 E4E8051B ((heat waves)) ((<var 08 E4E80503 ((fair skies)) ((<var 08 E4E80532 ((umbral wind)) ((<var 08 E4E80533 ((umbral static)) ((<var 28 ((Weather)) E80502 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E804E805 ((.
